forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after 3am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 9am. Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight embraces Downtown San Francisco, a gentle coolness drapes the city, with the faint promise of fog lurking in the corners of the night. The current temperature hovers comfortably, inviting those who venture out to don light layers. A low mist begins to unfurl after 3 AM, hinting at the characteristically mysterious bay weather, while tomorrow’s dawn may awaken to patchy fog before retreating into the bright embrace of a mostly sunny day. 

As the sun rises, temperatures will hover around a brisk 59, shifting ever so slightly into the afternoon's cooler embrace. The city, marked by its iconic hills and stunning vistas, appears poised for a gentle day where the west-southwest winds will dance softly through the streets. For the thoughtful observer, this offers an opportunity to wander the hidden alleys and enjoy a leisurely café break, perhaps savoring a warm drink while nestled indoors, watching the world float by. If the outdoors beckons, a light jacket will be your faithful companion, perfect for the moments when the chill bites unexpectedly. In this ethereal urban landscape, both the fog and the sun promise a day that is as captivating as it is comfortable, perfect for quiet explorations or contemplative strolls.
